entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning late this evening and ending before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 6:24 PM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers ending late in the morning then 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level lowering to 1400 metres late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:24 PM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Clearing before morning. Snow level 1300 metres. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:24 PM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023
